he was having basically a two to
three-minute seizure every five minutes
there was no quality of life whatsoever
he couldn't eat anymore he couldn't go
to school he couldn't really do anything
there's no doubt in my mind had we not
pursued cannabis well that he probably

first step the most important thing is
to try and get some clarity for families

see what works and I suppose that's my
hope that we just get some clarity for
families and also for me as a physician
and our colleagues in terms of
guidelines for how we should prescribe
and how do we help these families
